TITLE: Edit your MP4 videos online
META: Easiest way to edit your MP4 videos online.
LABEL: DOCX to PDF

TEXTUAL_CONTENT.content: The conversion is absolutely free, so you can convert as many files as you want.
Our website is platform independent. It works on both Window and iOS Operating systems and can be used without any downloads required.
Our website prioritises its customers’ privacy. Since we work with cloud storage your files do not get uploaded. So, no chance of getting any data breach. Your data is safe with us!
The conversion process hardly takes a few seconds, depending on your file size, and you can get quick results easily.
Video editing is really fast and you can get your job done in no time
Our website is platform independent, can work on laptops, tabs and phones and the conversion is quick, it saves time.

HOW_TO_CONTENT.heading: How to edit your mp4
steps: Wait patiently till the video gets loaded
Choose appropriate settings in the workspace
Click on save to download your video

FAQ.question: What are the available aspect ratios while cropping?
FAQ.answer:
MP4 editor allows you to crop your video into multiple aspect ratios i.e.,1:1 (square), 16:9 (landscape), 9:16, 4:3, 3:4(portrait). You can even keep the original ratio of your video and make changes according to your requirement if you don’t want these standard aspect ratios.
MP4 editor allows you to crop the video as per your need. You only need to drag and adjust the box and move it to the area which you want to keep. MP4 editor makes cropping videos very easy.

FAQ.question: How long will it take to upload my video?
FAQ.answer:
The time taken to upload your video for cropping or editing depends on the size of your video. Better quality videos with higher resolution will take more time to upload as compared to low quality videos with lesser resolution.
It also depends on the type of video you want to edit/crop. The larger the size of the video, the longer it will take.

FAQ.question: What is CRF value?
FAQ.answer: Constant rate factor (CRF) is an encoding mode that adjusts the file data rate up or down to achieve a selected quality level rather than a specific data rate. CRF values range from 0 to 51, with lower numbers delivering higher quality scores.

FAQ.question: Will the quality of my videos decrease after cropping?
FAQ.answer:
MP4 editor allows you to choose the quality of the video as per your requirement. If you want high quality video, you can choose a higher resolution and the file size will be bigger. But if you care about the size of the file and can compromise in the size then chose a lesser resolution.
MP4 editor also allows you to choose the CRF value, which means you can choose the resolution and the CRF value as per your need.
CRF values lie from 0-1, where a lower CRF provides better compression and quality.

FAQ.question: What are the resolutions available and what will be the size of the file of different resolutions?
FAQ.answer: MP4 editor provides all the standard resolutions i.e., 1080p, 720p, 480p, 360p, and 240p. Keep in mind that a higher resolution file size will be more than a file with lower resolution. The size of the file will also depend on the length of the video, the resolution, the aspect ratio and the CRF values.

FAQ.question: What are encoding speeds?
FAQ.answer:
MP4 editor allows you to choose encoding speed i.e., the speed at which you want to convert the video and save it for download. The encoding speeds available with MP4 editor are ultrafast, superfast, very fast, faster, Fast, medium, slow, slower, very slow.
The slower the speed the better is the compression. MP4 editor provides a wide range of encoding speeds according to varying needs of our users and ensures to provide the best quality videos for each edit made by the user.

FAQ.question: What are the other options available other than cropping the MP4 video?
FAQ.answer:
MP4 editor provides many options. Apart from cropping you can trim your video, rotate it, change the resolution of your videos, and even increase or decrease the speed of your videos.
MP4 editor is platform that allows you to do multiple edits on a single platform. That too for FREE!

FAQ.question: Can I download the file after cropping in any other format?
FAQ.answer: MP4 editor allows you to edit your videos as per your need and requirements providing multiple attributes and functions. You can download the edited video in MP4 format only. However, you can use our other websites like MOV Converter, to finally convert your video in your desired format.

FAQ.question: What is the difference between trim and split?
FAQ.answer:
Trimming allows you to cut your video from either end of the entire length of the video. You can shorten your video as much as you like from either the starting or the ending or both as well.
Splitting a video, means dividing your video into two or more parts. After splitting you video you can make individual changes to video parts and save the video as one file.

FAQ.question: Can we remove the unwanted parts of the video?
FAQ.answer: Yes, you can easily split and trim the videos as per your requirement. MP4 editor allows you to split the video into multiple parts. Then you can individually edit each part of the video as per your need.

FAQ.question: Can I resize my videos?
FAQ.answer: You can use the resize video option to resize your videos to any size you want.

FAQ.question: Can I extract audio from my video files on this platform?
FAQ.answer: MP4 editor doesn't have an option where you can extract audio from your files. You can use the Extract Audio feature on safevideokit.com to extract audio from your files.

acceptedAnswer.text:
Most unopened items in new condition and returned within 90 days will receive a refund or exchange. Some items have a modified return policy noted on the receipt or packing slip. Items that are opened or damaged or do not have a receipt may be denied a refund or exchange. Items purchased online or in-store may be returned to any store.

Online purchases may be returned via a major parcel carrier. Click here to initiate a return.

mainEntity.name: How long does it take to process a refund?

acceptedAnswer.text: We will reimburse you for returned items in the same way you paid for them. For example, any amounts deducted from a gift card will be credited back to a gift card. For returns by mail, once we receive your return, we will process it within 4–5 business days. It may take up to 7 days after we process the return to reflect in your account, depending on your financial institution's processing time.

mainEntity.name: What is the policy for late/non-delivery of items ordered online?

acceptedAnswer.text:
Our local teams work diligently to make sure that your order arrives on time, within our normaldelivery hours of 9AM to 8PM in the recipient's time zone. During busy holiday periods like Christmas, Valentine's and Mother's Day, we may extend our delivery hours before 9AM and after 8PM to ensure that all gifts are delivered on time. If for any reason your gift does not arrive on time, our dedicated Customer Service agents will do everything they can to help successfully resolve your issue.

Click here to complete the form with your order-related question(s).

mainEntity.name: When will my credit card be charged?

acceptedAnswer.text: We'll attempt to securely charge your credit card at the point of purchase online. If there's a problem, you'll be notified on the spot and prompted to use another card. Once we receive verification of sufficient funds, your payment will be completed and transferred securely to us. Your account will be charged in 24 to 48 hours.

mainEntity.name: Will I be charged sales tax for online orders?

acceptedAnswer.text:
Local and State sales tax will be collected if your recipient's mailing address is in:
  • Arizona
  • California
  • Colorado
